# MirrorPath

**Protocol**

A protocol for legitimate arguments to `Mirror`’s `descendant` method.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol MirrorPath
```

## Overview

Do not declare new conformances to this protocol; they will not work as expected.

## Querying Descendants

- **descendant(_:_:)**: Returns a specific descendant of the reflected subject, or `nil` if no such descendant exists.

## Conforming Types

- Int
- String

items.description: Returns a specific descendant of the reflected subject, or `nil` if no such descendant exists.
items.name: descendant(_:_:)
